indexPageTitle.English: Blog source files are build products
indexPageTitle.简体中文: 博客源文件即构建产物

indexPageDescription.English: BBG is a free, open source, cross-platform, Electron-based static blog generator. Compared with other static blog generators, BBG uses a design in which the blog source file is the build product, making the build overhead almost zero and suitable for version management software such as Git.
indexPageDescription.简体中文: BBG 是免费开源的、跨平台的、基于 Electron 技术开发的静态博客生成器。相比其它静态博客生成器，BBG 在架构上采用了博客源文件即构建产物的设计，使得构建开销几乎为零，且适合 Git 等版本管理软件。

indexPageEnterGitHubBtn.English: Enter GitHub page of this project

bottomInformation.English: The source code of the software is released into the public domain.
bottomInformation.简体中文: 本软件的源代码属于公有领域。

thanksForContributorsOfLinuxPackages.English: The AUR version is maintained by @Misaka13514 and @zzjzxq33; the DEB package build process is written by @mzwing. Many thanks to them for their contributions!
thanksForContributorsOfLinuxPackages.简体中文: AUR 上的版本由 @Misaka13514 和 @zzjzxq33 负责维护；DEB 包的构建流程由 @mzwing 编写。十分感谢他们的贡献！

downloadPageTitleWin.简体中文: 下载适用于 Windows 的 BBG

downloadPageTitleMacOS.简体中文: 下载适用于 macOS 的 BBG

downloadPageTitleLinux.简体中文: 下载适用于 Linux 的 BBG

thankyouDescription.English: Your download should start in 10 seconds. If not, Click here.
thankyouDescription.简体中文: 你的下载应在 10 秒内自动开始。否则，请点击此处。
